biotools.summary: a web‐based prognostic model to predict the prognosis of Acute myeloid leukaemia patients. Using log-rank test and univariate COX regression analysis as well as LASSO-COX, AML patients were divided into high-risk and low-risk groups based on AML risk score (AMLRS) which was constituted by 10 survival-related genes.

bioschemas.name: AMLRS
